name: VR in Healthcare
desc: A VR platform for medical students to practice surgeries, visualize 3D organs, and attempt quizzes, guided by an AI avatar. Built using Blender and Unity.

name: Disaster Management System
desc: A system to detect disasters like fire, gas leaks, earthquakes, and landslides. Alerts are sent via email, SMS, and buzzer notifications, using Arduino and sensors.

name: Hand-Gestured IoT Controller
desc: A system to control IoT devices using hand gestures. Integrated Python and machine learning for gesture recognition and emergency alerts.

name: Mind Shield
desc: A website focused on emergency preparedness and mental health resources as part of the Infosys Springboard internship. It has SOS Alert, Journal, Chat features in it. Developed using Java.

name: Cake Zone
desc: A visually appealing landing page for a bakery, showcasing products, services, and contact details. Focused on responsive design and user engagement.
